attributes.action: Enforce a badger cull in areas that are badly infected with Tuberculosis
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Badgers are known to be the main cause of transmission of TB accross the countryside, yet the government still hasn't done anything about it. It has been proposed many times that a badger cull be put into affect immediatly, and that is what is needed. Here i propposed  a badger cull in all areas where Tb is particularily bad.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
